channel.title: Posts on The hungarian man who went to Malta
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The hungarian man who went to Malta

item.title: Github actions from zero to this blog
item.description: I wanted to try Github actions since it got announced. Finally I had it on my foreseeable list when I started this blog, and lately, I did it. üëè üéâüéÜ I got to a working pipeline in 25 tries, lets go through each step how it improved piece by piece. I started to work on it at night, thinking it would not take long. (hehe, famous last words). After around 20 failed runs, I went to sleep.

item.title: How this site is made
item.description: I wanted to try gohugo for a long time now, as I wanted to do more go stuff, even if it is just using it. Also, hugo has quite good benchmarks. (And luckily I need to use some go at work) Other points I wanted to fulfill: use GitHub pages (static) use markdown for editing and hugo is good for both. I wanted to use markdown because I like to write docs in md, and I don’t need an editor for that, I can do it on my phone, or any computer.

item.title: Transportation part 2, the receiving end
item.description: Logistics lvl 9000+ The monthly schedule of the transportation company was on 27th February, meaning they arrive to Malta on 1st March at night, and they collect the packages days before departure. Before I left we already had a lot of boxes filled, but my partner had another lot of left. On 25th of February the package collection happened. View this post on Instagram A post shared by thmwwtm (@thmwwtm)

item.title: Finding a home
item.description: First of all the culture of the real estate agents is much better here than at home. At least what I experienced. I asked three agents to look for a new home for us. All of them gave me multiple possibilities and looked for new ones immediately if I didn’t like the first. They took me from door to door, by own car, paying a quite expensive Bolt ride and once (it was my first week) I asked if we can go by bus, so I try that too, and she insisted on paying my ticket.

item.title: Transportation
item.description: I’ve worked abroad for quite some time. I got used to traveling. I made it easy for myself. I do not have too much stuff and I do not require too much to feel comfortable or at least “ok”. But now I am not alone what makes the relocation a bit more difficult. My partner has ten times more luggage than I, and our dog can not be moved by airplane.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Who writes it why and what will be here? If the title does not ring a bell you need to see this: Who I am a software developer from Hungary. After a while I felt the urge to leave my current enterprise position, and for some time already I had the idea to maybe try something abroad. I started to work with software somewhere in high school, then I was intern, worked at small company, startup incubator, startup, bigger company and enterprise.
